gurmukhi: ru`dR h√çY ru`dR jbY rn mY kib sXwm BnY irs nwd bjwXo ]sUr n kwhU qy nYku itkXo gXo Bwj gey n rqI ku diRVwXo ]
transliteration: Ruddra Hvai Ruddra Jabai Ran Mai Kabi Syaam Bhanai Ris Naad Bajaayo|| Soor Na Kaahoo Te Naik(u) Tikyo Gado Bhaaj Gad Na Ratiku Dridaayo||

gurmukhi: S`qRun ky duhU S`qRun sMg lY roK hlI su soaU fru pwXo ]sRI biRjnwQ so sXwm BnY jb hI iSv Awie kY ju`Du mcwXo ]2220]
transliteration: Shattroun Ke Duhoo Shattroun San Lai Rokh Halisu Sooo Dar(u) Paayo|| Sribrijnaath So Syaam Bhanai Jab Hishiv Aae Kai Juddh(u) Machadyo||2220

gurmukhi: jy sB Gwie clwvq BXo iSv qy sB hI biRjnwQ bcwey ]qaun smY iSv ko Apny sB sXwm BnY qk Gwie lgwey ]
transliteration: Je Sabh Ghaae Chadaavatt Bhyo Shiv Te Sabh Hibrijnaath Bachaae|| Taoun Samai Shiv Ko Apne Sabh Syaam Bhanai Tak Ghaae Lagade||

gurmukhi: ju`Du kIXo bhu BwNiq duhU ijh ko sB hI sur dyKn Awey ]AMq iKswie irswie kiRpwinD eyk gdw hU so rudR igrwey ]2221]
transliteration: Juddh(u) Keeyo Bahu Bhaant(i) Duhoo Jih Ko Sabh Hisur Dekhan E|| Ant Khisaae Risaae Kridaanidh Ek Gadaa Hoo So Rudraa Giraae||2221||

gurmukhi: jb ru`diH hir Gwie lgwXo ]ibsuDo kir kY BUim igrwXo ]SMkq BXo n iPr Dnu qwnXo ]sRI jdubIr shI pRB jwnXo ]2222]
transliteration: Jah Ruddrah(i) Har(i) Ghaae Lagadyo|| Bisudho Kar(i) Kai Bhoom(i) Giraayo|| Shankar Bhayo Na Phir Dhan(u) Taanyo|| Srijadoubeer Sahijaanyo||2222||

gurmukhi: rudR kop dXo qXwie jdupiq ko blu hyr kY ]pwien lwgXo Awie rhXo crn gih hir doaU ]2223]
transliteration: Rudra Kop Dayo Tyaae Jadoupat(i) Ko Bal(u) Her Kai|| Paain Laagyo Aae Rahyo Charan Gadh Har(i) Dooo||2223||

gurmukhi: ru`dR kI dyK dSw ieh BwNiq su Awpih ju`Du ko BUpq AwXo ]sXwm BnY ds sY Buj sXwm ky aUpr bwnn EG clwXo ]
transliteration: Ruddra Kidekh Dashaa Eh Bhaant(i) Su Aapath(i) Juddh(u) Ko Bhpat Aayo|| Syaam Bhanai Das Sai Bhuj Syaam Ke Oopar Baanan Ogh Chalaayo||

gurmukhi: EG jo Awvq bwnn ko sB hI hir mwrg mY invrwXo ]swrMg Awpn hwQ ibKY Dir kY Air ko bhu Gwien GwXo ]2224]
transliteration: Ogh Jo Aavat Baanan Ko Sabh Hihar(i) Maarag Mai Nivraayo|| Saaran Aapan Haath Bikhai Dhar(i) Kai Ar(i) Ko Bahu Ghaain Ghaayo||2224||

gurmukhi: sRI biRjnwiek kRu`Dq huie Apny kir mY Dnu swrMg lY kY ]ju`D mcwvq BXo ds sY Buj so Aiq Ej AKMf jnY kY ]
transliteration: Sribrijnaaik Kruddhat Hue Apne Kar(i) Mai Dhan(u) Saaran Lai Kai|| Juddh(u) Machaavadbhyo Das Sai Bhuj So At(i) Oj Akhannddjanai Kai||
